website_summaries.verdict: Plant-based products in an affordable kit for the cleaning of all electronic screens. One bottle provides 750 spritzes. E-wipes are washable/reusable.
pros: Kit includes 2 spray bottles and 2 large e-wipes
cons: Several users say the spray is of better quality than the e-wipe cloths

customer_reviews.title: Skeptic turned believer (in Calyptus)
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the product a few hours, but so far, this stuff is legit! It polished my old iPad screen to a mirror finish in no time. Just.out of curiosity, I used it on some acrylic baseball display holders. It took off all the shelf dust on them and polished them up like glass. Because of all the claims of (no alcohol, no chemicals, no this, no that), I thought I might be buying water in a spray bottle?!?! Nope ...whatever is in this stuff works! Give Calyptus a try. They already guarantee your satisfaction anyways!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect screen cleaner, no streaks, no lint. It cleans the best of all I've tried. Nice little Mom and Pop business too. You get two bottles and cleaning cloths for a pittance, it's the best deal and it works wonderfully. Thanks to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Picky

customer_reviews.title: The best screen cleaner I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This screen cleaner is outstanding. My laptop screen was covered in well over a year's worth of dust and grime and, but this cleaner immediately cut through it to restore it to crystal clarity. I can't recommend this highly enough, especially given the very reasonable price point.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I was hesitant... BUT it works great.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I was hesitant at first to purchase it due to the lack of reviews. However, it works as expected. I received two sets and it is perfect, I can now keep one at home and another at work. In short, IT GETS THE JOB DONE!
customer_reviews.author: eliana

customer_reviews.title: Streaky clean
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how this actually works. The spray/wipe combo is a good deal, but combined they don't work well at all... I've been seeing others say it's the wipe that actually doesn't work well, but idk I haven't actually used the spray with any other cloth besides this one. It leaves my screen streaky and almost like it has a weird film to it. I really wanted a cleaner/cloth combo and thought this would work out well. The reviews and description seemed promising, but after trying it out it feels like a total waste. I'm going to have to go and buy something else because this really does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Duran

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning screens!
customer_reviews.text: The amount of the product is a value for the price, it's perfect for cleaning my laptop screen, my laptop has a matte finish so I had to use multiple pumps of the product in order to clean the keyboard and mouse area, but it gets the job done..
customer_reviews.author: Iveth M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent screen cleaner set
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is a really nice screen cleaner set! Great value! The cleaning solution works well and is gentle on all screens. The big value, however, is the microfiber cloth. At 16" x 16", it is HUGE! The cloth is also super nice quality and has contrasting stitching around the edges, so no fraying. You will have this cloth forever! I will buy this set again!
customer_reviews.author: kattspajamas

customer_reviews.title: Damaged laptop display
customer_reviews.text: The display of my Mac was damaged after using this product. The Mac Pro was less than 2 years old. There are pink and green glitching lines throughout the screen now and the display panel will need to be replaced. I suppose I’ll never know if this product was the cause, but needless to say I won’t be using it again.
customer_reviews.author: amazon1987

customer_reviews.title: Screen cleaner kit
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning LCD tv screen, computer monitor and laptop screen. Also used on my glasses. No streaking and comes with a micro fiber cloth.
customer_reviews.author: magster

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Get it. This is really good stuff. Completely worth the money. A little spray goes a long way plus the microfiber cloth feels of really good material. I’ll be buying more for all the electronic screens in the house.
customer_reviews.author: SeaJay

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I always try and steer towards cleaner cleaning products and I’m glad I found this cleaner! I spray my laptop screen twice and wiped it and all of the smears came off without scrubbing!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I ran around the house this morning cleaning my phones, my computer and my Ipad and everything looks sparkly!! I also liked the instructions you included about keeping the cleaning cloth clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jan K

customer_reviews.title: Screen cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This product clean my computer and other screens very well, I dont have complains now, If you need something like that you can buy and use very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dielson V.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The last time I had bought a screen cleaner, it had been about half the size for twice the money. While this spray might not be quite as good as that spray, it's close enough that I am happy with it, and the amount means that it will last for a lot longer. On the other hand, the cloths are merely ok, not great, so I'll be sticking with the microfiber cloths I have.
customer_reviews.author: _orac_

customer_reviews.title: Clearly directed, well-packaged, and does the exact job I wanted it to do
customer_reviews.text: Clearly directed, well-packaged, and does the exact job I wanted it to do. I especially love how the wipes are machine washable. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Ward

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This screen cleaner is so wonderful for my laptop and phone. It really does the job and I love that it is a safe cleaner. I also appreciate the cleaning cloth provided. So much better than throwing away a wipe into the environment every time that you clean the screen. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Barr

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly. Every bit of dust, finger prints, oil, grime, etc, comes off without having to apply any pressure to the monitor. No scrubbing needed. If you have anything on your screen that has some kind of texture, raised in someway, you'll need to get the textured part off prior to cleaning the area with the screen cleaner. The cleaner is not designed to remove that kind of buildup/mess/spill though it will remove any stain left behind. That is to be expected though. Highly recommend. I was able to make my laptop screen, desktop monitor, and TV spotless in 10 minutes with very minimal effort.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: They work well, make the screen very clean. Worth for the price, good value. Plus, this product is environmentally friendly-all natural ingredient (A great plus!) I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Magical
customer_reviews.text: I have many monitors as you can see. I needed a solution for cleaning them because you need all the advantages of a clean monitor you can get when you are gaming competitively. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sary

customer_reviews.title: Calyptus Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I would have to say this is the best computer screen cleaner out there now. It didn't smear my screen and completely made it look new again. Wow Wee.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Gave one as a gift and I’m using one. I really like it. Very good quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Entangledmass

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Other ones let me down, this DID NOT!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at so many reviews for different products like this, and have tried a few others only to be disappointed. As a graphic designer, I need my screens to be clean. I use this for all my computers, phones and even my family's glasses! Great product. **WANT TO ADD: I used to use lysol wipes on my Cricut cut mats to help them get re-sticky again...well with current times (COVID) wipes are hard to come by. I tried a few things with no luck... BUT THIS SPRAY WORKED AMAZING!!! Like new mats! I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and didn't smell funny. Price was more than fair for 2 bottles (Hubby stolen one) Overall, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Cici Sparkman

customer_reviews.title: I will buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This smells good, it is natural, does not leave a streak on your screen. Cleans EVERYTHING. Comes with enough to last for a great while. I love it and I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrezza Wright

customer_reviews.title: Very good, great value
customer_reviews.text: The best screen cleaner I have ever used. The cloth is decent, but the solution works very well. Have never seen my screen look so close to new until I used this.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works great on all electronics and doesn’t leave streaks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a replacement for another screen cleaner I purchased on Amazon. This product is the best screen cleaner I’ve ever used. Not only does it clean screens with little effort, it doesn’t leave and streaks and makes screens look like new. I use it on my Nintendo Switch, iPad, iPhone, 4K TV and my laptop and desktop computer screens. So it can be used on pretty much all your device screens. Worth your money and will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Kydo26

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly as described.  Great find!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best screen cleaner. Not only is the screen clean and bright but it also protects against finger prints and smudges.
customer_reviews.author: ERK

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans my phone and laptop screen very good. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product because it's eco-friendly and it came in 2 packs. One tiny little mishap that happened though was when I opened the package, the caps on the bottles weren't super tight so it spilled a little inside the plastic bag. It's not a super big deal so I didn't mind it and just wiped it down with a napkin.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Easy and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Super inexpensive, and I noticed my phone screen looked genuinely clean after first use. No weird smells and no streaking. Just follow the very simple directions and do not over saturate your device. I do wish that they would include a more detailed ingredients list, because it only reads “plant based cleaning agents”.
customer_reviews.author: ravyn scherker

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: Good cleaner. I use it regularly and it does a nice job on mine and my wife's Samsung's
customer_reviews.author: Vanz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Cleaned phone screen and lasted for hours. The wiping cloth was wonderful, such good quality. Will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: great screen cleaner
customer_reviews.text: i had a bit of a splatter on my tv (kids) but this removed it right away. i was so impressed i used it on my very dirty touchscreen laptop screen, a year of yuck was gone in seconds. i was blown away. its night and day and no nasty streaks left behind like the other brands. and no i am not a payed reviewer i payed hard earned cash for this with little expectations and a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great product, with the added benefit of being environmentally concious.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Brook

customer_reviews.title: Wish I’d found this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say how impressed I am with this product. Our flatscreens are dusty and I was researching how to safely clean them. Plus we are an Apple product family and everything is touchscreen. We also have to be concerned about chemicals in our home due to hyper-sensitive pets. We tried a couple of different natural products, but, this was our favorite hands down. Cleans amazingly and there hasn’t been a streak left yet. Microfiber is small but really effective. Going to order the bigger microfiber and more product now that we know how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Vint

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I ordered this screen cleaner! It's been great to use. Returns my phone screen, laptop screen, privacy filter, etc. to looking like new again. I love that you get two bottles and 2 cloths. One for work, and one for home. It also doesn't have a loud chemical or alcohol smell that other screen/lens cleaners do.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Great screen cleaner/spray nozzle not so good
customer_reviews.text: Received two 4 oz bottles. The first bottle I used a few times to clean my cell phone and lap top screens. I am very pleased with results of Calyptus Natural Screen Cleaner. However, the spray nozzle stopped working and my first bottle is still quite full. So now, I am cleaning screens by pouring a little solution directly on the cleaning cloth then apply it to a screen. I hope the broken spray nozzle is just a fluke because I really like Calyptus screen cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Brindles Fey

customer_reviews.title: Liked everything about it
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully packaged & works beautifully as well. Tried it out on my laptop screen, haven't seen a smudge yet, about to try it out on my iPhone. Ecologically sound - liked the fact that both the cleaner itself has none of the additives that are dangerous chemicals. The cost was definitely affordable & included TWO bottles of spray & TWO wipes. And best of all, if you love blues & greens like I do, you'll be thrilled by the wipes which I'm tempted to hang on the wall !!
customer_reviews.author: BookBabe

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This was the best value on Amazon and I love how it is natural and non-toxic. I gave one set to my sister and kept one for myself. We both cleaned our computers right away and were very pleased. It is a great little gift (one for you and one for someone else). So fun! And cute Koalas on the bottle. I will be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Watson

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I normally just used alcohol wipes on my devices but this stuff definitely cleans better and without any risks to the finish. For this price it's a dang good deal. I've been using it daily for a month or so and have barely used much. The included cloths are great too.
customer_reviews.author: Zero33

customer_reviews.title: This product is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my work computer screens and an old screen my Dad had that was lying around unused for a long time. None of them had been cleaned in a very long time, and they were pretty bad. This stuff made them look brand new and the price was right as well.
customer_reviews.author: MBraidwood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome screen cleaner set great price
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised on how well it cleans, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bottles

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Awesome company too.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to clean my phone and monitor screens with and this showed up. I've bought some of this company's other products before and they were fantastic. I was able to easily clean my filthy monitor screens. I won't have to struggle using a cheap microfiber dampened with water anymore. The cloth included is very high quality. This product is perfect for what it does and seems like a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this to clean my touch screen laptop and it really cleaned neat. I would buy this again if needed. Pros: - Value for Money - Twin Pack - Comes with Cleaning Cloth - Easy Use Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: SuReSh

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I keep one at my office and one at home.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Works really well, no issues whatsoever ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and used it on my full screen TV also on the wall - I tested a small corner first to make sure it didn't smear but worked really well. You get two containers for the price so it is definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to work great. The cloth it comes with takes off residue alone but the spray makes it better. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lissabee2011

customer_reviews.title: As described 100%
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly perfect. lol My eyes are happy minus chemicals so close to them. Shines my glasses up just fine! Low odor! Nice cloths! Bottles in perfect condition! Will definitely order again! =D
customer_reviews.author: LisaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Surprised for its high ratings
customer_reviews.text: Bought this purely on price and review. Not sure what should I say about the spray as I used water before and it worked just the same. But I definitely didn't like wipes, first they are too small I think bigger wipes would be more comfortable. Second the wipes quality is not so good, I achieved better results just using regular microfiber. Also this wipes still leave marks from hands once you touch glossy screens like on mac. I would expect them to clean it better than bounty or regular microfiber towel.
customer_reviews.author: Oktay Babayev

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered quickly and worked exactly as described. I liked that it was a 2 pack and I shared with my Mom!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy A. Paynter

customer_reviews.title: A good screen cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Cleans my cell phone screen very well, despite having no harsh chemicals. Does not seem to prevent fingerprints, but effectively removes them. The microfiber cloths are good and come in resealable bags.
customer_reviews.author: risngfrce

customer_reviews.title: Works Great...!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed.. Works well and is a good alternative to a alcohol or ammonia based cleaner. Idk if ppl really know not to use those types of cleaners bc they will eventually damage your screens
customer_reviews.author: Carl Gantz

customer_reviews.title: Eco Conscious Best in Class Screen Happiness Possible!!!
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift to my Beloved sisters, they are really hard to shop for and veeeery eco conscious ebay ears and amazoners...Just fantastic product, gonna preserve for myself now! Fast ship, adorable packaging by report, and AAA. Gotcha some!
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is indeed a great product. I used it to clean my laptop and iPad screens, and it was beyond my expectations. The screens are now super bright and clean. I recommend this product. :)
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Marques Figueiredo Costa

customer_reviews.title: Natural ingrediets and a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Anytime a product claims all natural ingredients I wonder about how good the cleaner will actually be. I am very happy to say this product works very well. I will buy again when needed. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: David I.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical before I bought it. My MacBook Air screen is always dirty and I can never get it clean. This stuff got it clean super quick and easy. Also worked great on my TV. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jjdawgs84

customer_reviews.title: great bargain
customer_reviews.text: cleaned glue from screen from old screen protector, the other products would not
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence johnson

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.text: I use these literally all the time. I'm glad I bought them because you can feel the difference afterwards. There are no harsh smells. I use them to clean my case and glasses sometimes, and it streaks a bit at first but does the job. You get two and they last a while!! You should definitely buy them or something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: It works well at cleaning my phone, my computer screen and other glass surfaces. Rmember to spray the cloth and wiping the surface to avoid getting spray in the electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Teaman

customer_reviews.title: Cloths are tiny & cleaner is gel like and thick
customer_reviews.text: The solution is really thick & hard to spray. The cloths are TINY. I had to use front & back of one cloth to clean my 27” monitor & it was so dirty the cloth is practically ruined. I tried reaching out to the company & provided this feedback privately — with no response. I’ll be returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: No stinky alcohol smell! This cleaner works great for tablets, phones, and laptops. My laptop and phone look brand new. Fantastic price for such a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Theis

customer_reviews.title: Definitely should clean your electronics’ screens with this.
customer_reviews.text: Wow this product is really good. It really works. I have never cleaned my laptops screen before and a few sprays of this with the towel cleaned it so easily. The spray has no harsh chemicals and no smell to it at all. Leaves no residue or streaks. Very impressed and definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Left a film on my screen, not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This was very poor quality. All this does juust smear oils and dirt, etc into screen and did not clean or do what it was supposed to. I would skip if I were you on this particular product. You are better off purchasing something else that actually removes the dirt and smudges on your digital devices, which this doesn't but merely rubs it in.
customer_reviews.author: AZDesertMonsoons89

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very effective
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, and cleans the screens - phone, laptop, 28" monitor - very well. I did buy extra microfiber cloths so that I can clean and dry many devices at the same time. REMINDER: Spray the cleaning solution on the cloth, not on the screen This applies to all cleaning solutions, not just this one.
customer_reviews.author: Polurker

customer_reviews.title: Makes your electronics new looking again.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for your money,cleans like Mr. clean,i tried other screen cleans,they only made a bigger mess,but this is the best works,plus like it should,and works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my! I will never! Buy another product than this ever again! I was/still am amazed by how clean this product cleans screens. I even used it on the front of my stereo which has a glass pane on it and glass cleaner can't touch this stuff! And the price for what you are getting is out of the world! I am definitely in for life with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: No streaks or scrapes
customer_reviews.text: Works better than the eyeglass and camera lens cleaners i have been using. No streaking, works well. Use it on my aluminum mouse pad now too. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Just got in today. I'm a healthcare worker and I wanted something that would sanitize my phone and not break down my liquid glass. I also used it to clean up my laptop and I am very impressed with how well it works. Not only does it sanitize it made it look new. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davis

customer_reviews.title: Cleans thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: My laptop screen hadn't been properly cleaned but when I used this product, the screen is as good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Leach

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and cleans surfaces well. Also, I use it on my eye glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Heckethorn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: Does a fantastic job! Comes with its own cloth. My screens look brand new. Cost is so reasonable for the amount of product you receive. Absolutely delighted!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Freak accident saviour!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had just received delivery of this product the day before when the freakiest of freak accidents occurred...I set my hot coffee mug down on one of my Omega-3 Fish Oil Capsules and it got stuck to it instantly...in my attempt to separate them it cracked and squirted all over my ipad...oily, fishy splatter all over it...a couple of sprays with Calyptus and it was squeaky clean!... magic!
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: Safe for toddlers, will purchase again!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked rather nicely, my toddlers love to crayon the TV's along with touching screens, leaving oily dirty prints on my them 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: great product and great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my new touch screen laptop...it works great...no smudges or film left over...also used it on my cell phone and screen is pristine
customer_reviews.author: pharm Lady

customer_reviews.title: One of a kind, all In one screen cleaner !
customer_reviews.text: No harsh smells, no streaks, no residue. This is probably going to me my new screen cleaner ! Thank you so much ! It's perfect because usually strong ammonia smells make my head hurt but this product is virtually ODERLESS!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave pixel

customer_reviews.title: Cleans completely and easily with no streaking.
customer_reviews.text: I have used screen cleaner from an office store for a long time. I was never completely satisfied. I tried this Calyptus screen cleaner and it was night and day! A couple of spritzes and the screen was completely cleaned, with no streaks and it was very easy (no elbow grease required). The microfiber cloths are top notch, not some cheap add on. The price and what you get for it make this a no brainer. It is one of the best products I have bought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: G.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great screen cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Used this screen cleaner on 2 older HDTVs (Sharp and Samsung), 2 laptops (Dell w/touchscreen and HP), and my iPhone 7. Awesome results! Looks like water only but really cleaned my screens with no streaks using the provided microfiber towel. Had to go over my Sharp 60” twice since it had old streaks from a bad cleaning. Looks great again👌🏽 Great value. I wish I bought a larger bottle of cleaning solution.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well and is Sustainable
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner works very well, and most the the packaging is sistainable. I have several different products from this brand, and I have been happy with each purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Echo Luna

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: this is not only a screen cleaner but it also cleans my glasses with no smear and gets every thing off. This is a great item
customer_reviews.author: marine 1

customer_reviews.title: Works great with no harsh smell
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning off smudges from all of my electronics. Came with 2 sets. Gave one to my sister. Plus no harsh smell!
customer_reviews.author: Jennablare

customer_reviews.title: Cleans screens well
customer_reviews.text: Spray cleans well. Does not leave any streaks or residue. Only need to go over screen one time and is clean. I even use it for my eye glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Fast and friendly customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I received a screen cleaner kit that was damaged during shipping, causing one of the spray bottles to leak in its packaging. I reached out to Koala Lifestyle’s customer service, and they were very prompt and friendly in helping resolve the issue with me. Thank you Koala Lifestyle!
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: works very good for all my electronics. The t.v. my computer screen, and my cell phone and Amazon fire tablet. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Quick cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed! Simply amazing how well this product cleans my iPad screen! Thanks for the quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Susie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! This has been a nice cleaner for my screens. The spray doesn't seem to leave a streak as other sprays do. That is even with a microfiber cloth as well. Which this does come with one and so far its been really great. You guys did an amazing job with this product and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: McScruffNerfHerder

customer_reviews.title: Buy now!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t sleep on this product! I bought the two small bottles, I should’ve bought the bigger sham and bottle. Cleaned everything and removed a thick film on one of my TVs from a cleaning with a bad product. I recommend you buy this I’ll be buying this from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Good size / meh cleaning cloth / cleans screen
customer_reviews.text: Was able to clean the screen quickly and efficiently but could not get the finger prints off the back of the LCD case. The free cleaning cloths were not what I expected but a nice touch. Still switched to micro fiber but not a bad option if you have nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love cleans glasses, phones, computer screens and even tv screens. After using you see the dust does not collect very quickly. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen Safe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my new Lenovo Yoga touchscreen laptop. I read that you shouldn't use cleaners on touchscreens because it could damage them, but since this one is all natural it worked great for me. Removes smudges and fingerprints easily and doesn't leave any type of residue or streaks. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn

customer_reviews.title: Windex
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in April 2020. Regardless of all the positive reviews, the bottles I received does leave a film. I do like the push bottom bottle with the mist. I replaced the liquid with Windex, and that resolved my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: 2 swipes to bright
customer_reviews.text: This is phenomenal! Literally one spray, 2 swipes with the cloth they sent and it is clean and bright! Our phones and tablet screens are not caked with chemicals, not sticky, or have residue. They're so clean and smooth. I'm beyond Impressed! My husband went through the whole house finding any screen to clean! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: Lnk

customer_reviews.title: Get's The Job Done
customer_reviews.text: This product actually works and I'm more than happy with my purchase. Cleans up all the dust and grime without issue. Was looking for something that wasn't damaging or glorified water and I'm glad I tried this out.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Works OK....a little expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product but there are a lot of great products out there that do just as good a job and cost less. Maybe price reflects the cost of the little cloth but microfiber cloths are readily available.
customer_reviews.author: Search Alot

customer_reviews.title: Will clean screen pretty well, but don't expect miracles
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because 1) I needed a screen cleaner that could clean both my computer monitor and my TV; 2) is eco-friendly (no harsh chemicals); and 3) was affordable. Received it today, and cleaned my monitor. It got all the dust (more than I thought, tho admittedly it's been a while since the last time I cleaned it), but there are 3 or 4 really small specs that the cleaner simply will not clean off the screen, even after a 2nd cleaning. No streaks, though ) Overall, I have mixed feelings about this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: jon h.

customer_reviews.title: Works Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has been streak free on every device - phone, tv, car screen. The cloth is soft and perfect and the spray is light and effective. I sure wish the packaging had less plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for Macbooks
customer_reviews.text: They provide you with 2 spray, and 2 microfiber, but the microfiber is not good, it leaves a white dot almost like a sparkle on your screen, and I doubt the spray is good too judging by the microfiber, for phones it does better, but for sure there are better alternatives that cost a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Tino

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is amazing! It dries almost instantly and leaves my devices looking like new! I have used it on my Tv, iphone, ipad, and laptop. it leaves no residue and has no smell. If you need an electronics cleaner you need this! I really love that it came with two bottles and two microfiber cloths. The only small thing is the bottle is little hard to push sometimes. But no biggy!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: The cloth is amazing
customer_reviews.text: The cloths that come with this are amazing. You almost don't need the spray. I thought I had read in the description or reviews that the spray killed germs. I can't find that on the label.
customer_reviews.author: mommyhead

customer_reviews.title: Great product to clean a plethora of delicate surfaces!
customer_reviews.text: The cloths are a decent size (8X8) and have a nice weight to them. The spray shines well with no chemical scent. No lint or streaking. Yep! This is a good kit to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: ExoticMunchi

customer_reviews.title: Super Clean!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it came with two of everything & it's plant based! This will last me a looong time. It cleans really well, specially on my laptop screen which I gave up cleaning when it got super oily from my keyboard cover. It had no trouble getting the oils and smudges off, so would totally suggest it to anyone looking for a good screen cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

product_meta.title: Calyptus Screen Cleaner Kit | Proudly USA Made | Safe for Cleaning Digital Screen, Smart Phone, Tablet, iPad, Laptop | Natural, Plant Based, VOC Free | 1,500 Sprays | 8 Ounces + 2X Calyptus E-Wipes
feature_bullets: GREAT VALUE: Includes 2x 4 oz Calyptus Screen Cleaner spray bottles and 2x 8x8 inch Calyptus Screen Cleaning E-Wipes | 1,500+ Sprays
PLANT-BASED: Our ingredients are 100% natural and plant derived | Non toxic, biodegradable, and plain safe for use | VOC free | Proudly American Made

SUPER SAFE: ZERO Alcohol, Ammonia, VOC's, Solvents | Our ultra premium Calyptus Screen E-Wipe soaks up oil and removes abrasive dust particles | Calyptus is the safest screen cleaner for you, your screens, and the environment
MANY USES: Super safe and highly effective for all electronic screen cleaning purposes | Safe for tablet, laptop, smart phone, digital screen, computer monitor, car touch screens | 100% streak free
CALYPTUS PROMISE: We only produce safe, natural, and effective cleaning products that you'll love. If for any reason you're not 100% satisifed, contact us and we'll take care of you
